p: The amounts of total as well as α- and β-glucans in S. crispa were determined with the enzymatic method. The results are presented in Table 2. The total content of glucans in the cauliflower mushroom was 29.96 g/100 g of dry weight. It was found that the amount of β-glucans was higher than that of α-glucans. β-glucans accounted for 91.86% of the total glucans in S. crispa.
